name: Man Vs. Missiles
description:
Fly your plane and avoid the incoming missiles for as long as you can!

- Use your fingers to control the plane with on-screen joystick
- Collects coins and use them in the Shop to buy new planes & upgrades
- Collect Power-ups like Shield, Boost, Ammo and Shock-Wave
- Deploy Flares to destroy the missiles
- New unique environments with each plane
- 6 types of game modes - Career, Multiplayer, Tournaments, Duels, Survival and Time Attack
- 50 levels with unique objectives to complete in Career Mode
- Invite your friends and compete with them on the Game Center leaderboard
- Supporting Russian, Korean, Chinese and Japanese languages.
- 7 Days Free Trial for VIP Access

Download the game if you choose to accept this challenge of Man Vs. Missiles!

Promo Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DAk7ztFxF4o

Please rate the game if you like it it, and feel free to send us your feedback to info@spiel-s.com.

--------
PLEASE NOTE: Man Vs. Missiles is free to download and play; however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Auto-renewable Subscription, called VIP Access is a service that unlocks all available Planes in the game, and also gives you access to VIP Planes with special abilities. It also removes all Ads and gives you 500 Daily Bonus coins.

You can subscribe to this using 3 Packs - Weekly with a 7-Days Free Trial, Monthly, and Yearly. All payments will be charged to your iTunes Account after purchase and when the subscription auto-renews.

Subscriptions will renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.

Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited once you purchase a subscription.

PS. None of the In-App Purchases are mandatory to complete the game. You can finish the entire game including all levels, without the need of purchasing any Subscription or Coins Pack, but if you wish to enjoy all the Planes or finding it difficult, you can Subscribe which will unlock & buy all the planes in the game.
